name: Upload a license for the first time
description: When you boot a virtual machine for the first time, you can use the following endpoint to upload a license:

params.name: license
params.description: The content of your _.ghl_ license file.

params.name: password
params.description: You **must** provide a password _only if_ you are uploading your license for the first time. If you previously set a password through the web interface, you don't need this parameter.

params.name: settings
params.description: An optional JSON string containing the installation settings.

name: Upgrade a license
description: This API upgrades your license and also triggers the configuration process:

params.name: license
params.description: The content of your new _.ghl_ license file.

name: Check configuration status
description: This endpoint allows you to check the status of the most recent configuration process:

name: Start a configuration process
description: This endpoint allows you to start a configuration process at any time for your updated settings to take effect:

params.name: settings
params.description: A JSON string with the new settings. Note that you only need to pass the specific settings you want to modify.

params.name: maintenance
params.description: A JSON string with the attributes `enabled` and `when`.

name: Add a new authorized SSH key

params.name: authorized_key
params.description: The path to the public SSH key.

params.name: authorized_key
params.description: The path to the public SSH key.
